item.title: Activity 1 - Algorithms and Coding
item.description: You will need to submit your code for each activity to the hand-in system (only accessible from the school network). Sequencing Activity 1.1 Activity 1.2 Activity 1.3 Activity 1.4 Variables and Lists Activity 2.1 Activity 2.2 Activity 2.3 Activity 2.4 Activity 2.5 Iteration and Selection Activity 3.1 Activity 3.2 Activity 3.3 Activity 3.4 Accelerometer Activity 4.1 Activity 4.2 Activity 4.
